title: While I Was In The Hospital For A Terminal Illness, A Devil Claiming To Be A Drop-out Visited Me, So I Made A Contract With Her Out Of Pity But For Some Reason, She Would Not Take My Soul As Payment - Novel Updates
tags: Demons   Loli   Oneshot   Succubus   Terminal Illness
author: 雨宮 小鳥
description:
'Is there any wish you want me to make come true?'

After being told she only has one month left to live, Yuri Shirakawa is visited by Lilim, a drop-out devil.

Though Yuri has accepted her fast-coming mortality and does not want for anything, Lilim needs to fulfill a human’s wish and get the corresponding payment.

So Yuri offers a wager to Lilim, saying, 'If you make a nice suggestion that I want you to make come true, I'll make it my wish.'>
